a.title: Sick students and when to stay home
a.span: Sick students and when to stay home

a.title: Solar Energy at Eastern Greene Schools
a.span: Solar Energy at Eastern Greene Schools

br.strong: Eastern Greene Schools provides challenging standards and a safe environment, where all students learn and grow to be caring, responsible, life long learners.

p.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: Arial; margin: 6px 0px 9px; color: rgb(119, 119, 119); text-align: center;

div.p: At Eastern Greene, we believe in challenging our students to achieve their personal best each day. We seek to center those efforts around the ideas of the 4Cs--Creativity, Collaboration, Communication, and Creative Thinking. Our classrooms promote these concepts in the curriculum and the activities designed for our students. In doing so, our students produce outstanding accomplishments throughout our district in academics, community involvement in learning, extra-curricular activities, and comprehensive student preparation for life after high school. Our hope is that our students make a difference not only while in school, but also well beyond. Please take a moment to read the superintendent's message for more about our schools!

p.style: font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; line-height: normal; margin: 6px 0px 9px; text-align: center;
p.span:
We salute our student scholars and all of our faculty and staff for making Eastern Greene Schools a warm and welcoming community in which to learn, grow, and give one's #thunderbirdbest !
